dcterms:description: OpenDV-2K is the largest public driving dataset to date, containing over 2059 hours of driving videos paired with diverse text conditions, including contexts and commands. It is constructed from high-quality YouTube driving videos and merged with several publicly licensed datasets to enhance diversity.
dcterms:title: OpenDV-2K

dcterms:creator: Andreas Geiger
Philip Lenz
Christoph Stiller
Raquel Urtasun
dcterms:description: The KITTI dataset provides a benchmark for various tasks in autonomous driving, including stereo, optical flow, visual odometry, and 3D object detection.
dcterms:title: KITTI

dcterms:description: The Cityscapes dataset is designed for semantic urban scene understanding, providing high-quality pixel-level annotations for various driving scenarios.
dcterms:title: Cityscapes

dcterms:description: The Waymo Open dataset is a large-scale dataset for autonomous driving, focusing on perception tasks with diverse sensor modalities.

dcterms:description: nuScenes is a multi-modal dataset for autonomous driving, providing data from various sensors and annotations for multiple tasks.

dcterms:description: nuPlan is a closed-loop machine learning-based planning benchmark for autonomous vehicles, providing a platform for evaluating planning algorithms.
dcterms:title: nuPlan

dcterms:description: Talk2Car is a dataset designed for taking control of self-driving cars through natural language commands.

dcterms:description: The ONCE dataset contains one million scenes for autonomous driving, providing a large-scale resource for training and evaluating models.
dcterms:title: ONCE

dcterms:description: Honda-HAD is a dataset focused on grounding human-to-vehicle advice for self-driving vehicles, providing insights into driver behavior.
dcterms:title: Honda-HAD

dcterms:creator: Vasili Ramanishka
Yi-Ting Chen
Teruhisa Misu

dcterms:description: Honda-HDD-Action is a dataset for learning driver behavior and causal reasoning, providing a resource for understanding driving actions.
dcterms:title: Honda-HDD-Action

dcterms:creator: Vasili Ramanishka
Yi-Ting Chen
Teruhisa Misu
Kate Saenko
dcterms:description: Honda-HDD-Cause is a dataset for learning driver behavior and causal reasoning, similar to Honda-HDD-Action.
